title: Exploring the Role of Higher Education Third-Space Professionals: Reflective Case Studies and Live Streaming Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in elementary mathematics education and proficiency in basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Exploration of methods for pre-/in-service elementary teachers to understand the role of third-space experts in higher education environments and apply them to math education through reflective case studies and live streaming

learning_goals: It can explain the core roles of third-space experts and strategies for building trust relationships in higher education environments.
It can analyze the limitations of technology-centered approaches and innovative pedagogies through reflective case studies.
It can develop and execute a design plan for mathematics education simulations utilizing live streaming tools.
It can demonstrate the practical competencies of third-space experts through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
